name: Flappy Chirper
description:
Flappy Chirper

Tap and fly ! Just tap the screen and your little chirper will fly. 

Avoid the obstacles and the evil eagle. 

Catch every coin and blast the balloons to get more points.

- Nice pixel graphics

- Six different characters to choose

- Three amazing worlds to discover

You can find it also in Google Play Store !

Install instructions

It's easy to install! Just download the .exe, and follow the instructions.
